description: As taken from the HITRUST CSF, this section cover strategic risk managment items. Specifically in this cluster, the tags deal with the development and management of risk as an organizational program.
name: RISK-MGMT-PROGRAM

values.description: A framework is used to provide the foundation and organizational arrangement for the design, implementation, monitoring, review and continuous improvement of a comprehensive information security and privacy risk management program.
values.value: OSRS CMCF Strategic Framework: 0.a Risk Management Framework
